name: A Magical Friday Night: Vs. Holy Quintet
summary: A Magical Friday Night Vs Holy Quintet is a mod directed by Kixel & Ryoku 05. The mod is based on the main team of the Puella Magi Madoka Magica series. The mod serves as a massive love letter to the franchise as a whole with GameJolt achievement support, A Leaderboards system, multiple timelines, & Girlfriend's vast adventure as a Magical Girl.
